Name: Cervando
description:
Cervando is 38 years old. He lives in a common-law marriage with his partner and their 3 children. Cervando lives in his own house made of basic materials and located in the district of Pomahuaca, province of Jaén and department of Lambayeque in Perú. Cervando has very good personal and professional references from the locals. Inhabitants of the area work mostly in agriculture, commerce and animal husbandry.

Cervando works in agriculture, specifically he grows coffee of the Catimor varietal. He has more than 5 years of experience in the job. Cervando is asking for a loan that will be invested in the purchase of manure, fertilizers and to pay workers. In this way he will gain a higher income for himself and his family.

Cervando is a repeat borrower with Edpyme Alternativa.
